MRDS Big Bang
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2010 Topics (Year of the Shock Rock): MRDS Big Bang
By Thorr on Thursday, September 9, 2010 - 04:07 pm:

Well, I finally beat the Big Bang on MRDS. I have been going really slowly, but I finally got it done. While this is nothing special, the reason I post it is because of HOW I won...

I Won the Big Bang by -FORFEIT-.

Yes, Centauros forfeited the match. I have had this happen with story bosses before, but only AFTER I had defeated them once. (Amino's dragon in Class Official Cup is a common one.)

Never would have thought a story battle would be avoided like that.
